product_name: Sonoma Gourmet Vodka & Cream Pasta Sauce | USDA Organic, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free and No Sugar Added | Made Fresh Ingredients | 25 Ounce Jars (Pack of 2)
description: FLAVOR IS OUR SECRET SAUCE: It's seriously a party in a jar. Our organic vodka cream sauce combines fresh and local ingredients to create a bold and delicious sauce that will add an extra layer of flavor to any dish. The alcohol gets cooked off in the process so itâ€™s kid-friendly, too. Bottoms up! RECIPES FOR DAYS: We have the mind of a chef so warn your taste buds because they are in for a treat. MAKES FOR A GREAT GIFT: You can create a beautiful basket filled with Sonoma Gourmet's products. Consider adding our traditional plum tomato marinara or one of our other delicious varieties.
